page.title: 11ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Sidlesham has many people who are good at Art and Craft. Most of them do their work as a hobby but some earn their living at it. There is a professional photographer and a lady who paints in oil and water colour. She does silk screen printing too. She teaches Art at the Chichester College of Further Education. There is also a professional flower arranger. The Good Companions is a group of old age pensioners who meet regularly and make stuffed toys and wooden toys such as rocking chairs and coffee tables. They sell these to help run their club. The Womens' Institute do various crafts such as corn dollies, needlework and cookery. A few ladies have taken up spinning.
